text:
@WhiteHouse "“The argument is that you bought yourself some time. But what did you do with that time? You didn’t use it to prepare hospitals, you didn’t use it to ramp up testing.... nearly 20 million are unemployed, tens of thousands of Americans are dead,”...."
https://t.co/ZwqCDyuK1D
